titleStmt.title: A commentarie vpon the Epistle of Saint Paul to the Romanes, written in Latine by M. Iohn Caluin, and newely translated into Englishe by Christopher Rosdell preacher. Whereunto is added a necessarie table for the better and more readie finding out of certayne principall matters conteyned in this worke
Commentarius in Epistolam Pauli ad Romanos. English
titleStmt.author: Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564.
Rosdell, Christopher, b. 1553 or 4.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Thomas Dawson] for Iohn Harison and George Bishop,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Commentarius in epistolam Pauli ad Romanos.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: [par.] 2[par.]⁴ 3[par.]² A-2B 2C² 2D.
Running title reads: M. Ioh. Caluin vpon the Epistle to the Romaines.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
